articles.title: Webb Uncovers Most Distant Known Galaxy – “Most Significant Extragalactic Discovery to Date” - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronomers using NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope have discovered the earliest and most distant galaxies known, dating back to just 300 million years after the Big Bang, a major milestone in understanding the universe's early stages. An international team o…
articles.content: This infrared image from NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope (also called Webb or JWST) was taken by the NIRCam (Near-Infrared Camera) for the JWST Advanced Deep Extragalactic Survey, or JADES, program… [+6738 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang promises new computing age led by Taiwanese tech - Fox Business
articles.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang gave a keynote address at the 2024 Taipei International Information Technology Show discussing AI capabilities for future technology.
articles.content:
